mapper.select: SELECT q.readable, q.member_no, b.board_no, c.name, b.title, b.view_count, b.registered_date FROM pf_qna q JOIN pf_question_category c ON c.category_no = q.category_no JOIN pf_board b ON q.board_no = b.board_no ORDER BY b.registered_date DESC, b.board_no DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT q.member_no, b.board_no, c.name, b.title, b.view_count, b.registered_date, b.content, q.email_notification, q.readable FROM pf_qna q JOIN pf_question_category c ON c.category_no = q.category_no JOIN pf_board b ON q.board_no = b.board_no WHERE b.board_no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pf_qna (board_no, member_no, category_no, readable, email_notification) VALUES(#{number}, #{memberNumber}, #{category.number}, #{readable}, #{emailNoti})
